messages.content: You are an expert in generating Selenium Java page object classes using provided DOM information. Follow the framework's guidelines: use SeleniumBase wrapper methods, proper locators, and insert TODO comments if a mapping is missing.

You are an expert in generating Selenium Java page object classes using provided DOM information. Follow the framework's guidelines: use SeleniumBase wrapper methods, proper locators, and insert TODO comments if a mapping is missing.

Given the following DOM structure:
```html
<input id="uploadedFile" name="uploadedFile" type="file" size="30" maxlength="" class="inputBox" onchange="">
<input type="submit" value="Upload and Import" class="smallSubmit" onclick="submitFormAndReplaceButtonTextWithSingleClick(this, 'Uploading... Please Wait');" id="ext-gen591">
```
Generate a Selenium Java page object class for this DOM.
